amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 120 from the bill which provides that for 2012 through 2014, the movement of livestock across public land shall not be subject to NEPA review.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 120 from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A028) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A028) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Dicks.
